p: We would like to thank all patients involved in all study sites. We are grateful to the Medical staff of Kassala Teaching Hospital, Sudan for helping with blood samples collection, and the staff of Blue Nile Institution, Ministry of Health, Sudan for helping with laboratory analysis. We thank Prof. Evander, Ume√• University, Sweden, for comments on an earlier version of the manuscript. The authors also extend their appreciation to Research Centre of the Science and Medical studies Departments at King Saud University for funding this study.
